Dear Ms. Kici:
Attached is the Renewal Inspection Report for the above referenced facility completed on
October 28, 2021. The study has determined substantial compliance with applicable
licensing statutes and rules, sections of the contract and Modified Implementation,
Sustainability, and Exit Plan (MISEP) requirements. It should be noted that violations of
any licensing rules are also violations of the MISEP and your contract. As indicated above
substantial compliance has been established therefore, your license is renewed.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and contact me with any
questions. In the event that I am not available, and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please contact the area manager at (616) 552-3662.
Sincerely,

III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS
1.) The facility is in compliance with all applicable rules and statutes.
2.) The facility is in compliance will all additional MISEP requirements.
3.) The facility is in compliance will all additional MDHHS Contract/Policy
requirements.
IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility did not require technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility did request or require consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care or incidents of
substantiated corporal punishment during this licensing period.
The facility did not have any special investigation during this licensing period, and
therefore did not have submitted corrective action plans
VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or MISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility be issued a renewal of their regular license.
